name: VideoTrack.sourceBuffer
description: The read-only VideoTrack property sourceBuffer returns the SourceBuffer that created the track, or null if the track was not created by a SourceBuffer or the SourceBuffer has been removed from the MediaSource.sourceBuffers attribute of its parent media source.

refs.name: Media Source Extensions
refs.description: The definition of 'VideoTrack: sourceBuffer' in the 'Media Source Extensions' specification.
